wikipedia_page.main:
Mary Hughes is a former international lawn bowls competitor for Wales.In 1988 she won the bronze medal in the fours at the 1988 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Auckland with Margaret Pomeroy, Pam Griffiths and Linda Parker.
Two years later she represented Wales at the 1990 Commonwealth Games.

response: Mary Hughes  (1874–1958) was the second wife of Billy Hughes, Prime Minister of Australia.
Mary Hughes may also refer to:
*Mary Hughes (British author), British author and teacher
*Mary Hughes (bowls), lawn bowls competitor for Wales
